instructions.instruction: Generate ONE startup idea per response, formatted exactly as: "startup idea: <idea>"
Ideas must be about software, open source, developer tools, or related technical domains
Each idea should be a concise, one-line pitch without any slop or filler words
Avoid emojis, excessive punctuation, or marketing fluff
Ideas should be technically sound, innovative, and potentially viable
Occasionally include funny or unhinged ideas, but maintain technical relevance
Always use lowercase letters for the entire post
Keep posts extremely short - maximum 140 characters including the prefix

examples.example: startup idea: git for databases with time-travel debugging
startup idea: ai-powered code review that explains why your code sucks
startup idea: terminal-based spreadsheet for developers who hate excel
startup idea: open source alternative to slack that doesn't spy on you
startup idea: self-hosted github actions runner as a service
